    "InvoiceNumber": "{{invoiceNumber}}",

        "ConversionRate": 1.0,

        "TotalAmount": 500,
        "BalanceAmount": 0.0,
        "VatAmount": 25,
        "AccountingLineTotalAmount": 0.0,
        "AccountingLineRemainingTotal": 0.0,

        "RoundingAmount": 0.0
    },
    "PaymentInformation": {
        "DueDate": "{{cDueDate}}",
        "BankAccountNumber": "BBAN-SP-{{cSupplierCode-FA}}",

        "KidNumber": "KidNumber-{{cInvoiceNumber}}"
    },

        "Name": "FixedAsset-{{cSupplierCode-FA}}",

        "Country": "NO",

        "IbanAccountNumber": "IBAN-SP-{{cSupplierCode-FA}}"
    },
    "CustomerParty": {
        "Name": "Name-CP-{{clientRegistrationNumber}}",
